Uses of Package
org.glite.authz.common.model

Packages that use org.glite.authz.common.model
org.glite.authz.common.model This model serves as a simplified XACML model and is used as the Hessian object model used to communicate between the PEP client and daemon. 
org.glite.authz.pep.obligation Obligation Handler (OH) interface for the PEP client and daemon. 
org.glite.authz.pep.pip Policy Information Point (PIP) interface for the PEP client and daemon. 
 

Classes in org.glite.authz.common.model used by org.glite.authz.common.model
Action
          An attribute-based description of an action to be authorized.
Attribute
          An attribute that identifies either a Subject, Resource, Environment or Action.
AttributeAssignment
          A requirement that a particular attribute have a given set of values within the PEP.
Environment
          An attribute-based description of the environment in which an Action is to be performed.
Obligation
          Description of an obligation that must be performed by the PEP.
Request
          An authorization request.
Resource
          An attribute-based description of the resource within which an Action to be authorized is made.
Result
          Result of an authorization request.
Status
          Status of an authorization request.
StatusCode
          The code for a Status.
Subject
          Attribute-based description of the subject of an authorization request.
 

Classes in org.glite.authz.common.model used by org.glite.authz.pep.obligation
Request
          An authorization request.
Result
          Result of an authorization request.
 

Classes in org.glite.authz.common.model used by org.glite.authz.pep.pip
Request
          An authorization request.
